nml_option.name: config_use_DMSTracers
nml_option.description: if true, the 'DMSGRP' category is enabled for the run

nml_option.name: config_use_DMSTracers_surface_bulk_forcing
nml_option.description: if true, surface bulk forcing from coupler is added to surfaceTracerFlux in 'DMSGRP' category

nml_option.name: config_use_DMSTracers_surface_restoring
nml_option.description: if true, surface restoring source is applied to tracers in 'DMSGRP' category

nml_option.name: config_use_DMSTracers_interior_restoring
nml_option.description: if true, interior restoring source is applied to tracers in 'DMSGRP' category

nml_option.name: config_use_DMSTracers_exponential_decay
nml_option.description: if true, exponential decay source is applied to tracers in 'DMSGRP' category

nml_option.name: config_use_DMSTracers_idealAge_forcing
nml_option.description: if true, idealAge forcing source is applied to tracers in 'DMSGRP' category

nml_option.name: config_use_DMSTracers_ttd_forcing
nml_option.description: if true, transit time distribution forcing source is applied to tracers in 'DMSGRP' category

nml_option.name: config_use_DMSTracers_surface_value
nml_option.description: if true, surface value is computed for 'DMSGRP' category

nml_option.name: config_use_DMSTracers_sea_ice_coupling
nml_option.description: if true, couple DMS fields with sea ice

package.name: DMSTracersPKG
package.description: This package includes variables required to include DMSGRP.

package.name: DMSTracersBulkRestoringPKG
package.description: This package includes variables required to compute bulk restoring on the DMS tracer group.

package.name: DMSTracersSurfaceRestoringPKG
package.description: This package includes variables required to compute surface restoring on the DMS tracer group.

package.name: DMSTracersInteriorRestoringPKG
package.description: This package includes variables required to compute interior restoring on the DMS tracer group.

package.name: DMSTracersExponentialDecayPKG
package.description: This package includes variables required to compute exponential decay on the DMS tracer group.

package.name: DMSTracersIdealAgePKG
package.description: This package includes variables required to compute ideal age forcing on the DMS tracer group.

package.name: DMSTracersTTDPKG
package.description: This package includes variables required to compute transit-time distribution forcing on the DMS tracer group.

var.name: DMS
var.description: Dimethyl Sulfide

var.name: DMSP
var.description: Dimethyl Sulfoniopropionate

var.name: DMSTend
var.description: Dimethyl Sulfide Tendency

var.name: DMSPTend
var.description: Dimethyl Sulfoniopropionate Tendency

var.name: DMSSurfaceFlux
var.description: Dimethyl Sulfide Surface Flux

var.name: DMSPSurfaceFlux
var.description: Dimethyl Sulfoniopropionate Surface Flux

var.name: avgOceanSurfaceDMS
var.description: Ocean Surface DMS concentration

var.name: avgOceanSurfaceDMSP
var.description: Ocean Surface DMSP concentration

var.name: iceFluxDMS
var.description: Surface DMS flux from sea ice

var.name: iceFluxDMSP
var.description: Surface DMSP flux from sea ice

var.name: dms_flux_diag_ifrac
var.description: Ice Fraction used in DMS flux calculation

var.name: dms_flux_diag_xkw
var.description: XKW used in DMS flux calculation

var.name: dms_flux_diag_atm_press
var.description: Atm Pressure used in DMS flux calculation

var.name: dms_flux_diag_pv
var.description: Piston Velocity used in DMS flux calculation

var.name: dms_flux_diag_schmidt
var.description: Schmidt Number used in DMS flux calculation

var.name: dms_flux_diag_sat
var.description: DMS Saturation used in DMS flux calculation

var.name: dms_flux_diag_surf
var.description: Surface DMS Values used in DMS flux calculation

var.name: dms_flux_diag_ws
var.description: Wind Speed used in DMS flux calculation

var.name: DMSPistonVelocity
var.description: A non-negative field controlling the rate at which DMS is restored to DMSSurfaceRestoringValue

var.name: DMSPPistonVelocity
var.description: A non-negative field controlling the rate at which DMSP is restored to DMSPSurfaceRestoringValue

var.name: DMSSurfaceRestoringValue
var.description: Temperature is restored toward this field at a rate controlled by DMSPistonVelocity.

var.name: DMSPSurfaceRestoringValue
var.description: Salinity is restored toward this field at a rate controlled by DMSPPistonVelocity.

var.name: DMSInteriorRestoringRate
var.description: A non-negative field controlling the rate at which DMS is restored to DMSInteriorRestoringValue

var.name: DMSPInteriorRestoringRate
var.description: A non-negative field controlling the rate at which DMSP is restored to DMSPInteriorRestoringValue

var.name: DMSInteriorRestoringValue
var.description: Temperature is restored toward this field at a rate controlled by DMSInteriorRestoringRate.

var.name: DMSPInteriorRestoringValue
var.description: Salinity is restored toward this field at a rate controlled by DMSPInteriorRestoringRate.

var.name: DMSExponentialDecayRate
var.description: A non-negative field controlling the exponential decay of DMS

var.name: DMSPExponentialDecayRate
var.description: A non-negative field controlling the exponential decay of DMSP

var.name: DMSIdealAgeMask
var.description: In top layer, DMS is reset to DMS * DMSIdealAgeMask, valid values of DMSIdealAgeMask or 0 and 1

var.name: DMSPIdealAgeMask
var.description: In top layer, DMSP is reset to DMSP * DMSPIdealAgeMask, valid values of DMSPIdealAgeMask or 0 and 1

var.name: DMSTTDMask
var.description: In top layer, DMS is reset to TTDMask, valid values of DMSTTDMask or 0 and 1

var.name: DMSPTTDMask
var.description: In top layer, DMSP is reset to DMSPTTDMask, valid values of DMSPTTDMask or 0 and 1
